EmailTemplate.name: System down email
EmailTemplate.subject: eBranch is temporarily down
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your email. We apologize for the inconvenience. We are experiencing technical difficulties with eBranch. Until we have a resolution, if you are not able to get through, you are welcome to call us at 800-456-5067 or come into any branch.
It has been our pleasure to help. If there is anything else we can do, please do not hesitate to contact us. We appreciate your membership. Have a wonderful day!
Thank you,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
{!Case.OwnerTitle}
Idaho Central Credit Union
Eastern Idaho 208-478-3300
Treasure Valley 208-846-7000
Magic Valley 208-733-4777
www.iccu.com
Helping members achieve financial success.
